overview: MERCS MovieÂ (2017)  Graphic novel, action feature film. Set in a Hyper Reality world where soldiers for hire clash and bullets fly. A mix of live action and animation bring this classic tale of action, revenge, retribution and friendship to life. A dark twisted tale not for the faint hearted.
tagline: A rag tag group of mercenaries take on one last mission.
title: MERCS Movie
